briefdescription.para: Numerical tolerance of z below which K_n(z) = { 1 (n=0), 0 otherwise }.
Order of local Taylor series to be used in Bessel function expansion.
names of each atom in order of atomic number
Array of function pointers to hand-coded x**n routines.

detaileddescription.para: Gamma function tabulation, where GAMMA[i] = Gamma((i+1)/2) e.g. GAMMA[0] = Gamma(1/2) = sqrt(Pi), GAMMA[1] = 0! = 1, GAMMA[2] = Gamma(3/2) = sqrt(Pi) / 2, etc.

memberdef.argsstring: (const int la, const double alpha, const double A2, const double eta)
memberdef.name: shell_bound

detaileddescription.para: Initialises the global factorial and double factorial arrays

memberdef.argsstring: (const int lmax, const double x, const double phi)
memberdef.name: realSphericalHarmonics

detaileddescription.para:
Calculates real spherical harmonics S_lm(theta, phi) for all l, m up to lmax
lmax
- the maximum angular momentum needed
x
- cos(theta), where theta is the polar angle in spherical coordinates
phi
- the azimuth angle in spherical coordinates
a matrix S(l, l+m) of the spherical harmonic values

parameterdescription.para: - a reference to a TwoIndex array

memberdef.argsstring: (std::basic_ostream< Ch, Tr > &os, std::tuple< Args... > const &t) -> std::basic_ostream< Ch, Tr > &
memberdef.name: operator<<

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, std::vector< T > &results, double thresh=1e-5, double precision=1e-10)
memberdef.name: check_file

detaileddescription.para: A helper function for tests that reads in a file of values and compares them to those provided by the test, returning 0 on success or 1 on failure.

parameterdescription.para: - the type of the value; must be pipeable from a stringstream.
- the file to read data from
- reference to the vector of calculated results

simplesect.para: 0 if the results agree with the file within 0.00005%, 1 otherwise
